title: Chocolate Chip Cookie
info: The Chocolate Chip Cookie is a Hardmode food item that grants the Plenty Satisfied buff. This lasts for 20 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon () or by double-tapping the buff icon (). It has a 1.33*1/75 (1.33%) chance of being dropped by Gastropods.
stat:
